List.Name: Scheduler_Log
List.Description: Log messages generated by the Scheduler's PowerShell scripts

List.Name: Scheduler_WorkflowStates
List.Description: List for workflow states

List.Name: Scheduler_Languages
List.Description: List of all languages in which trainings will be provided

List.Name: Scheduler_Countries
List.Description: List of all countries in which trainings are provided

List.Name: Scheduler_Locations
List.Description: List of all locations in which trainings are provided

Field.Name: LocationEN
Field.Description: Name of the Location or City (english)

List.Name: Scheduler_Buildings
List.Description: List of all buildings in which trainings are provided

Field.Name: BuildingEN
Field.Description: The name or number of the building (english)

Field.Name: LocationEN
Field.Description: The location in which the building is located

List.Name: Scheduler_Rooms
List.Description: List of all rooms in which trainings are provided

Field.Name: RoomName
Field.Description: Name or number of the room

Field.Name: BuildingEN
Field.Description: The building in which the room is located

Field.Name: AvailableSeats
Field.Description: Maximum Number of available trainingseats WITHOUT the trainer's seat!

List.Name: Scheduler_Topics
List.Description: List of all topics to which trainings, modules and stages are provided

Field.Name: TopicsEN
Field.Description: Name of the topic or technology

Field.Name: TopicsDE
Field.Description: Name of the topic or technology

List.Name: Scheduler_KickOffItems
List.Description: List of KickOffItems which are combined by date and room

List.Name: Scheduler_Stages
List.Description: List of all stages provided

Field.Name: StageTopicsEN
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: LanguageShortcut
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: Published
Field.Description: Set to true to publish the stage

List.Name: Scheduler_Modules
List.Description: List of all modules provided

Field.Name: StageEN
Field.Description: The stage where the module is related to

Field.Name: ModuleTopicsEN
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: LanguageShortcut
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: Published
Field.Description: Set to True if module shall be published

List.Name: Scheduler_Trainings
List.Description: List of all trainings provided

Field.Name: ModuleEN
Field.Description: The module to where the training is related to

Field.Name: TrainingTopicsEN
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: LanguageShortcut
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: Published
Field.Description: Set to True if module shall be published

List.Name: Scheduler_Trainers
List.Description: List of all trainers

List.Name: Scheduler_Dates
List.Description: List of all dates at which training session are offered

Field.Name: DateEN
Field.Description: The name or identifier of the trainings date

Field.Name: DateDescriptionTeaserEN
Field.Description: Short Teasertext for description in calendar

Field.Name: DateDescriptionTeaserDE
Field.Description: Kurzer Teasertext der Beschreibung für den Kalender

Field.Name: TrainingEN
Field.Description: The training to which the date is related to

Field.Name: RoomName
Field.Description: The room into which the date will be done

Field.Name: LanguageShortcut
Field.Description: The topics related to the stage

Field.Name: Trainer
Field.Description: The trainer leading the training's date

Field.Name: Duration
Field.Description: The duration of the date in hours

Field.Name: Start
Field.Description: The starting time for the trainings date

Field.Name: End
Field.Description: The ending time for the trainings date

Field.Name: FreeSeats
Field.Description: The number of available trainings seats. (Will be edited by script)

Field.Name: BookedSeats
Field.Description: Number of booked seats.(Will be edited by script)

Field.Name: FreePCs
Field.Description: The number of available PC's. (Will be edited by script)

Field.Name: Published
Field.Description: Set to True if module shall be published

Field.Name: Bookable
Field.Description: Set to true if date is bookable, initially set by creator, later changed by script

List.Name: Scheduler_Subscriptions
List.Description: List of the subscriptions created primarily by endusers

Field.Name: SubscriptionID
Field.Description: The id of the subscription.(Will be calculated by script)

Field.Name: CreateForAnotherUser
Field.Description: Set to True, if subscription will be created for another user.

Field.Name: NeedPC
Field.Description: Set to True if Subscriber has no PC to bring to the Training.

Field.Name: Subscriber
Field.Description: If CreateForAnotherUser is set to False, Subscriber will automatically set to the value of Creator and field will be hidden in forms.

List.Name: Scheduler_Stages
List.Description: Übersicht aller angebotenen Etappen

List.Name: Scheduler_Modules
List.Description: Übersicht aller angebotenen Module

List.Name: Scheduler_Trainings
List.Description: Übersicht aller angebotenen Schulungen

List.Name: Scheduler_Dates
List.Description: Liste aller Termine, an denen Schulungen angeboten werden

Field.Name: DateDescriptionTeaserDE
Field.Description: Kurzer Teasertext der Beschreibung für den Kalender

Field.Name: RoomName
Field.Description: Bezeichner des Raumes, in dem das Training stattfindet.

Field.Name: Duration
Field.Description: Die Dauer der Schulung in Stunden

Field.Name: FreeSeats
Field.Description: Anzahl der noch nicht gebuchten verfügbaren Schulungsplätze

Field.Name: BookedSeats
Field.Description: Anzahl der bereits gebuchten, nicht mehr verfügbaren Schulungsplätze

Field.Name: NewSubscription
Field.Formula:
=IF(Buchbar=1,CONCATENATE("Zum Termin anmelden"),"

Termin aktuell nicht buchbar

")

List.Name: Scheduler_Subscriptions
List.Description: Liste aller Buchungen, die durch Benutzer erstellt wurden

Field.Name: NeedPC
Field.Description: Auf 'Ja' setzen, wenn der anzumeldende Teilnehmer einen Schulungs-PC benötigt. Bitte nur auswählen, wenn definitiv kein eigener PC vorhanden ist.

Field.Name: Author
Field.Description: Ersteller der Anmeldung.(Wird automatisch von SharePoint ausgefüllt.)

Field.Name: CreateForAnotherUser
Field.Description: Auf 'Ja' setzen, wenn die Anmeldung für einen anderen Benutzer erfolgt.

Field.Name: Subscriber
Field.Description: Hier den anzumeldenden Teilnehmer angeben, wenn dieser nicht der Ersteller der Anmeldung ist.

List.Name: Scheduler_Stages
List.Description: List of all stages provided

Field.Name: StageEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the stage

Field.Name: KickOffItemEN
Field.Description: The name or identifier of the KickOff-Item

List.Name: Scheduler_Modules
List.Description: List of all modules provided

Field.Name: ModuleEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the module

Field.Name: StageEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the stage

Field.Name: KickOffItemEN
Field.Description: The name or identifier of the KickOff-Item

List.Name: Scheduler_Trainings
List.Description: List of all trainings provided

Field.Name: TrainingEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the Trainings

Field.Name: StageEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the stage

Field.Name: ModuleEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the module

Field.Name: KickOffItemEN
Field.Description: The name or identifier of the KickOff-Item

List.Name: Scheduler_Dates
List.Description: List of all dates at which training session are offered

Field.Name: DateEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the trainingsdate

Field.Name: TrainingEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the training

Field.Name: StageEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the stage

Field.Name: ModuleEN
Field.Description: Name or identifier of the module

Field.Name: KickOffItemEN
Field.Description: The name or identifier of the KickOff-Item

Field.Name: BuildingEN
Field.Description: The name or number of the building (english)

Field.Name: LocationEN
Field.Description: Name of the Location or City (english)

Field.Name: RoomName
Field.Description: Name or identifier in which the training will be done.

Field.Name: Duration
Field.Description: The duration of the training in hours

Field.Name: Start
Field.Description: The starting date for the training

Field.Name: End
Field.Description: The starting date for the training

Field.Name: Bookable
Field.Description: If set to true, the Date is available for bookings.

List.Name: Scheduler_Subscriptions
List.Description: List of the subscriptions created primarily by endusers

Field.Name: CreateForAnotherUser
Field.Description: Set to True, if subscription will be created for another user.

Field.Name: NeedPC
Field.Description: Set to True if Subscriber has no PC to bring to the Training.

Field.Name: Subscriber
Field.Description: If CreateForAnotherUser is set to False, Subscriber will automatically set to the value of Creator and field will be hidden in forms. Otherwise insert user to subscribe.

Field.Name: Author
Field.Description: The creator of the subscription.(Will be automatically generated by SharePoint.)
